Description

Service class for interacting with the Books service

Return value

Description

Retrieves a specific volume entry.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$volumeId string | null | The volumeId of interest. null
$location Zend_Gdata_Query | string | null | (optional) The URL to query or a Zend_Gdata_Query object from which a URL can be determined. null

Return value

Type Description
Zend_Gdata_Books_VolumeEntry The feed of volumes found at the specified URL.
